content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Nice to meet you, Haoyu. You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: I'm sorry to hear that you didn't reach an agreement. If you're comfortable discussing further, could you please elaborate on why you couldn't agree on a price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not agree on the price because I was not satisfied with the rental price proposed by the landlord. I felt that it was not within my budget and I was looking for a more affordable option.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Thank you for sharing that information. It's important to find a price that works for both parties. Would you be willing to negotiate further or are you considering other options?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I was willing to negotiate further, as evidenced by the multiple attempts to find a price that would work for both parties. I started at 900 Euro per month and gradually lowered the price to 700 Euro per month in our conversation.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: It sounds like you made a good effort to reach a compromise. Did the landlord make any counteroffers during your negotiation?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] Yes, the landlord did make counteroffers. He started at 900 Euro per month and then made multiple counteroffers, lowering the price to 750 Euro per month in our conversation.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: It seems like both parties were willing to negotiate. Did you discuss any additional terms or conditions that might have affected the price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] In the provided conversation, there was no discussion of additional terms or conditions that might have affected the price. The focus was solely on the rental price of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang
